pomodoro.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro.description: A Pomodoro Timer built with C#. It is a time-management tool that uses a timer to break work into 25-minute distraction-free intervals called â€œpomodoros.

contractSystem.title: Contract System
contractSystem.description: A contract management system built with C# and Microsoft SQL Server to manage the database. It helps manage employee information, job positions, and salaries to generate contracts. It includes a dashboard that displays all workers in a table, allowing users to view their basic information.
